channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Post Status Notifier Lite
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Post Status Notifier Lite

item.title: CVE-2022-4325|2024-08-03T01:34:50.167Z -- unknown -- post%20status%20notifier%20lite
item.description: The Post Status Notifier Lite WordPress plugin before 1.10.1 does not sanitise and escape a parameter before outputting it back in the page, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting which can be used against high privilege users such as admin.
